trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> método antes de adicionar um controle a uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento fornece uma oportunidade de cancelar o processo antes de ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> evento é chamado depois que um controle foi adicionado a uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> class contains information that can be used within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> classe contém informações que podem ser usadas dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being added and the zone it is being added to.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece acesso para o controle de Web Parts que está sendo adicionado e a zona que está sendo adicionado ao.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (or server or user control) to be added to a Web page or opened on a page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (ou o controle de servidor ou usuário) a ser adicionado a uma página da Web ou aberto em uma página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> that <c>webPart</c> is being added to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> ao qual a <c>webPart</c> está sendo adicionada.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the ordinal position that <c>webPart</c> occupies in <c>zone</c>, relative to other controls in <c>zone</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a posição ordinal que a <c>webPart</c> ocupa na <c>zona</c>, em relação a outros controles na <c>zona</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone that the Web Parts control is being added to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a zona de Web Parts à qual o controle de Web Parts está sendo adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> that the Web Parts control is being added to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> que o controle de Web Parts está sendo adicionado ao.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição no índice de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dentro de sua zona.

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: A ordem numérica de um controle dentro da zona.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controle em uma zona tem um valor de índice de zero.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> propriedade indica a ordem numérica (ou a posição ordinal) dentro da zona para o controle de Web Parts que está sendo adicionado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle usa essa propriedade para controlar e gerenciar a sua coleção de controles de Web Parts em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> propriedade para um controle não é igual ao valor de índice para o mesmo controle dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> coleção.
